A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is the worst main Star wars movie so far.

It tries to be surprising for surprising sake and makes little sense in way of plot or characters. They did succeed in surprising me. I'm surprised they made this piece of trash.

A very nihilistic movie with so much grey you can't care about the poorly written new characters. At this point the only character with depth is Kylo.

I've watched every one since empire in the theaters since I was a kid. No more. They even destroyed any plots they had created in awakens. RIP Star wars.
